title: 192 - The Great Gnocchi Heist
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with all the boys in studio and Boston Connor is tearing todays full barn. The boys all kick it off with the boys giving an update on their latest clan success as our dear friend Nick guides this full barn. The boys then jump into the POD Fod, which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today FOD includes zoom firings, a look at the upcoming Black Adam movie, a Batman spinoff, possibly the world’s largest poop and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
